name: Testro
description:
Testro is a short 2D Sci-Fi Shooter Indie Game that involves a robot that are being tested by a bunch of scientist. You need to pass a bunch of levels that involves different kinds of test and object. If you pass the test you get the reward, if you lose wou will get terminated.

NB: This game is poorly made.

Mininum System requirements*:

Processor: 2.0 Ghz (Can run on 1.6 Ghz with no lag but may crash in some part)

RAM:

0.5GB for Windows XP 32bit||||1 GB for Windows XP 64bit||||2 GB for Windows 7/8/8.1 32bit|||| 4 GB for Windows 7/8/8.1 64bit and Windows 10 32bit/64bit

Disk space: 20 MB free space (including save file)

Operating System: Windows XP 32 bit or Higher

1280 x 720 Screen Resolution

Mouse and Keyboard

DirectPlay (OPTIONAL)

*for current version (1.1.2.0)

How to install:

Extract ZIP and play directly (no need to install)
